basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Tyler LeDuc. I am an Arizona based Software Developer that likes building things. I graduated from the University of Arizona in December 2020 with a Bachelors degree in Computer Science. Currently  I'm working with the newest front-end frameworks like Angular and React. Feel free to check out my projects, skills, and experience to learn more about me!

projects.title: Automated Scheduling Bot
projects.description: The most expanded application I've had the opportunity to work with. I learned many different technologies and my code was reviewed by an awesome curator. This was developed to automate the scheduling and email workflow using a SOAP API which saved the company from having to hire an extra employee.

projects.title: Puzzle Platformer
projects.description: Group project for software development course. I was responsible for the UI which included designing and implementing the functionality for multiple menus. I also implemented Java Serialization so that players can save the game state and come back to where they left off. I earned an A grade :)

projects.title: Financial-Manager
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop a front-end implementation for an app that displays cryptocurrency and financial data from a Coinbase API key. This was also my first project in React framework. I've learned a lot!
